sense.name: an arbitrator or intermediary in a conflict
sense.examples: France has also sent a mediator to the negotiations. The couple decided to use a mediator to settle their divorce out of court.

sense.name: an instigating agent in a physical process
sense.examples: Histamine and heparin are allergy mediators released by mast cells in contact with an allergen. There is some unknown biochemical mediator involved in this cell response.
